text: Amurru, also known under the Sumerian name Martu (in Sumerian and Sumerograms: ð’€­ð’ˆ¥ð’Œ…), was a Mesopotamian god. He was associated with steppes and pastoralism. He developed other functions, becoming known as a god of the mountains, a warlike weather deity and a divine exorcist. Category:Mesopotamia Category:Gods and goddesses
title: Amurru (god)
